insert into five_ed_arrange_plan (arrange_id, major_name, dest_general_view, dest_craft, dest_architecture, dest_structure, dest_waterway, dest_hvac, dest_heat_engine, dest_electric, dest_automatic, dest_equipment, dest_telecom, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, dest_value1, dest_value2, dest_value3, seq) values (#{arrangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destGeneralView,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destCraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destArchitecture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destWaterway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destHvac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destHeatEngine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destElectric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destAutomatic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destEquipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destTelecom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{destValue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destValue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destValue3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update five_ed_arrange_plan set arrange_id = #{arrangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_general_view = #{destGeneralView,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_craft = #{destCraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_architecture = #{destArchitecture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_structure = #{destStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_waterway = #{destWaterway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_hvac = #{destHvac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_heat_engine = #{destHeatEngine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_electric = #{destElectric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_automatic = #{destAutomatic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_equipment = #{destEquipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_telecom = #{destTelecom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dest_value1 = #{destValue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_value2 = #{destValue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dest_value3 = #{destValue3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, arrange_id, major_name, dest_general_view, dest_craft, dest_architecture, dest_structure, dest_waterway, dest_hvac, dest_heat_engine, dest_electric, dest_automatic, dest_equipment, dest_telecom, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, dest_value1, dest_value2, dest_value3, seq from five_ed_arrange_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, arrange_id, major_name, dest_general_view, dest_craft, dest_architecture, dest_structure, dest_waterway, dest_hvac, dest_heat_engine, dest_electric, dest_automatic, dest_equipment, dest_telecom, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, dest_value1, dest_value2, dest_value3, seq from five_ed_arrange_plan
